meanings.definition: Most square or rectangular in shape.
meanings.sent1: The squarest table in the room was the one in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The building had the squarest windows I had ever seen.

meanings.sent4: Her jawline was as squarest as a perfectly cut gemstone.
meanings.sent5: The squarest room in the house was the most spacious and organized.
